= Installations Instructions =

The simplest way to install Voxtr is by downloading it directly to your mobile device. This is done the following way:

  # Open your mobile browser
  # Go to http://voxtr.googlecode.com/files/voxtr.jad or use the shortcut http://tinyurl.com/getvoxtr
  # Follow the instructions on the screen.

The Voxtr should now be installed on your mobile phone. Using the link above always insure that you get the latest version.
